description: Global setting to control unreal atmospheric styling when visualizing the scene in Carrot.

atmosphere.description: Atmospheric styling settings for the scene

sunAzimuth.description: The horizontal angle of the sun, in degrees

sunPitch.description: The vertical angle of the sun above the horizon

heliodonLongitude.description: Geographic longitude for simulating sun position

heliodonLatitude.description: Geographic latitude for simulating sun position

heliodonDate.description: Date used to calculate the sun position based on Earth's orbit

weather.description: Controls the density or presence of atmospheric clouds (0: no clouds, 1: fully overcast)

windOrientation.description: Direction the wind is blowing from, in degrees

windForce.description: Strength or intensity of the wind

fog.description: Controls the density or presence of atmospheric fog

exposure.description: Adjusts camera exposure, affecting brightness and contrast

useHeliodon.description: Enable or disable the heliodon system (sun simulation)
